Key Match Events: David Fry hit a two-run home run in the seventh
Fry added an RBI on a squeeze play in the ninth
Wenceel Perez hit an RBI hit in the sixth for the Tigers
Emmanuel Clase gave up a run in the ninth but closed the game on Matt Vierling
Post-Match Reflections: Tigers lost Game 4 but earned the edge for Game 5 due to Tarik Skubal's readiness
Guardians will face one of the best pitchers in the game in Tarik Skubal
Yankees reinforced their status as the top seed in the AL with a 3-1 series win over the Royals
Yankees will face the winner of the Detroit-Cleveland ALDS Game 5 in the ALCS
Miscellaneous Highlights: Game 5 will be played in Cleveland on Saturday
Royals' tremendous season ended with a 30-game improvement over their 2023 club
